contentrichtext.text: {{nihongo|'''Kamiyaku'''|上屋久町|Kamiyaku-chō}} was a [[towns of Japan|town]] located on the northern half of [[Yakushima]] (Yaku Island) in [[Kumage District, Kagoshima|Kumage District]], [[Kagoshima Prefecture|Kagoshima]], [[Japan]]. On October 1, 2007 Kamiyaku was merged with the town of [[Yaku, Kagoshima|Yaku]], also from [[Kumage District, Kagoshima|Kumage District]], to form the new town of [[Yakushima, Kagoshima|Yakushima]]. As of 2003, the town had an estimated [[population]] of 6,903 and the [[population density|density]] of 23.09 persons per km². The total area was 298.95 km². ==External links== *{{ja icon}}{{iawm|http://www.kamiyaku.jp/|Kamiyaku Town}} *{{ja icon}}[http://www.yakushima-town.jp/ Yakushima Town] {{coord|30|24|42|N|130|29|48|E|region:JP_type:city|display=title}} [[Category:Dissolved municipalities of Kagoshima Prefecture]] {{Kagoshima-geo-stub}}
